channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: The Dreame Aqua10 Ultra Roller Robovac Keeps Carpets Dry and Floors Free of Dirty Water
item.dc:creator: Sponsored
item.description: This article is sponsored by Dreame.
item.content:encoded: A robotic vacuum cleaner sounds like a great idea, until you realize that most of them can make as much of a mess as they promise to clean up! Wet, rotting carpets and "washed" floors that look like there's still a layer of grime on them are the least of the issues.

item.title: Are Milwaukee Tools at Home Depot Worth Buying?
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Everything you need to know about these red power tools.
item.content:encoded: When you need a power tool and head to the hardware store, you'll see options from Ryobi, DeWALT, RIGID, Makita, Milwaukee, and more displayed in a rainbow of colors. Once you choose a brand, you'll start stocking up on battery packs, chargers, and endless tools. Here's what you need to know about one of the most recognizable names, Milwaukee, and whether they're worth buying.

item.title: These Are the Difficulties of Working on an 8-Inch Screen
item.dc:creator: Bertel King
item.description: I still get more done when my display is tiny.
item.content:encoded: My everyday workplace is smaller than a monitor, smaller than a laptop, and smaller even than the netbooks of yore. But there are only a handful of times when this actually gets in my way.

item.title: Windows 10's Security Updates Now Have More Restrictions
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: You need to check a few things to continue getting updates for Windows 10.
item.content:encoded: We've warned you about it several times, but the day has finally come. Windows 10, first released a whopping ten years ago in 2015, has officially reached the end of its life, and it's (officially) deprecated as of now.

item.title: The 2026 BMW M240i Proves You Don’t Need an M2 to Have Fun
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: The 2026 BMW M240i delivers thrilling performance, sharp handling, and everyday comfort—all without the M2’s hefty price tag.
item.content:encoded: The 2026 BMW M240i makes a strong case for being one of the best driver’s cars in BMW’s lineup, even without the full M badge. It delivers thrilling performance, sharp handling, and everyday usability that rivals far pricier sports cars. For enthusiasts who crave excitement without sacrificing comfort, it’s the perfect middle ground.

item.title: You Should Try This Open-Source Document Converter
item.dc:creator: Corbin Davenport
item.description: Pandoc can convert between Word documents, Markdown, LibreOffice files, HTML, and many other formats.
item.content:encoded: There are endless options for converting documents from one format to another, like the ‘Save As’ function in word processors, or various online converters. There’s also an open-source utility for the job that I’ve been using constantly: Pandoc.

item.title: 6 Things You Can Connect to Your Home Assistant Server's USB Ports
item.dc:creator: Tim Brookes
item.description: Expand what your smart home can do with these inexpensive add-ons.
item.content:encoded: Home Assistant is a free and open-source smart home platform that brings a huge range of devices together. Installing Home Assistant on a spare laptop or single-board computer like the Raspberry Pi unlocks huge possibilities, but you can do even more with a few accessories.

item.title: This Solar-Powered 4K PTZ Camera Surprised Me In Almost Every Way
item.dc:creator: Patrick Campanale
item.description: Who knew a solar-powered camera could look so good?
item.content:encoded: TP-Link’s latest Tapo C660 Kit is a pretty great 4K PTZ security camera setup. With a bundled solar panel and simple mounting, this camera offers such fantastic video quality that I was honestly blown away.

item.title: Google Search Now Has Image Editing, For Some Reason
item.dc:creator: Arol Wright
item.description: I'm failing to see how this is correlated.
item.content:encoded: Google's AI features, at least many of them, are useful. But oftentimes, they can cross the line into bloatware, as it's the case with the vast majority of the AI stuff Google has tried to add to Search. Now, it got an image editing feature, but we really didn't need it here.

item.title: Here's the Easiest Way to Disable Windows 11's Microsoft Account Requirement
item.dc:creator: Nick Lewis
item.description: Don't get pushed into using a Microsoft account if you don't want one.
item.content:encoded: Since Windows 11's release, Microsoft has gradually been closing the loopholes and methods that allowed users to bypass the Microsoft account requirement.
